title: 🔥Brand New 1 bed/1 bath with LAUNDRY IN UNIT!
posting_body: Brand New One Bedroom in Little Village!
There is laundry in the building, and FREE street parking out front.
Coffee downstairs just opened, becoming the newest trend in the area!

This BRAND NEW beautiful one bedroom apartment is located in the Pilsen/Little Village neighborhood of Chicago, and is just a 7 minute walk from the California stop on the Pink Line and 3 blocks from Riot Fest.
Ideal for employees/students of Rush, UIC and Downtown Chicago.
BRAND NEW flooring and cabinetry throughout the apartment.
It is an open space with lots of sunlight!Central heat and AC!
One pet under 35lbs OK with no fee.
Water included in rent, other utilities are responsibility of tenant.
-No history of evictions or past records
-Net monthly income must be at least 2.5 times the rent combined together
-First month's rent + a $325 non-refundable move-in fee is required at lease signing.
This unit is beautiful and ready for great qualified tenants.
If you would like to schedule a viewing contact our leasing agent Lucy via TEXT message only at 773 877 9647 or email.
